thread.title: Elizabeth Warren Says Passport Numbers Affected in Equifax Breach; Company Denies It

author: AnnaMaria Andriotis
title: Elizabeth Warren Says Passport Numbers Affected in Equifax Breach; Company Denies It

organizations.name: equifax breach; company denies it equifax inc.

text:
Equifax Inc. failed to disclose that hackers gained access to consumers’ passport numbers, according to a report from Sen. Elizabeth Warren’s office on Wednesday.
The company said that is because it didn’t happen.
The Democratic senator from Massachusetts released the report following a four-month investigation by her office into the Equifax...
